## Events.CommentDrag.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `CommentDrag` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(opt_comment?: WorkspaceComment, opt_isStart?: boolean);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_comment | [WorkspaceComment](./blockly.comments.workspacecomment.md) | _(Optional)_ The comment that is being dragged. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_isStart | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether this is the start of a comment drag. Undefined for a blank event. |
